verbs.description: ANALYSIS : [ARG1: Michelle Obama] [V: placed] [ARG2: No . 2 in Gallup 's poll of the most admired women in the US] , [ARGM-ADV: while Melania Trump was No . 8] — and there 's a clear reason why .
